#BlackMagicCraft #Episode184 

In this video I try to turn plastic bags into usable scatter terrain for tabletop gaming. Ended up with a pretty decent looking stalagmite. Great for cave encounters in Dungeons & Dragons. 

You don't need much for this project aside from the bags, but you might want these:

HEAT GUN
(USA) https://amzn.to/3aFHpC1
(Canada) https://amzn.to/2Q34UNs
(UK) https://amzn.to/3cHkoAt
(Germany) https://amzn.to/2TDvzm8

HEAT RESISTANT GLOVES
(USA) https://amzn.to/2TzSO0G
(Canada) https://amzn.to/3cGG3J8
(UK) https://amzn.to/38xhWcA
(Germany) https://amzn.to/334XyhI

(As an Amazon Associate I earn from qualifying purchases)

title: Plastic Bag Terrain! Making Stalagmites with Garbage
